## How do I get better / increase my confidence in creating data visualizations?

Creating beautiful and effective data visualizations is a skill that gets better with practice -- give [#tidytuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) a whirl, enter a [Kaggle competition](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions), take a deep dive into aRtistry, or simply start playing around with data that means something to you.
